name: Happy New Song
description:
♡ Game made for #2019 New Years Jam

This game was made for 2019 New Years Jam, by Jhû. This is a Rythm game based on the theme "Fireworks".

♡ Features
  • +Multiples Songs to play.
  • ! Be carefull about failing to much.
  • ! The game is hard.
  • ! Post your Rank below♥.
  • Get an S, to make me happy.
♡ Controls
  • Use [Enter] to Start the game!
  • [A][S][D][J][K][L] to explode the fireworks!
♡ Credits
  • All is made by me, with some exceptions.
  • For makings free assets, special thanks to:
    • PLukx
    • bigpickle51
    • SubspaceAudio
    • JustFrederik
  • And a special thanks to my little sister Antonia, for testing the game millions of times with me♥.
